feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Road Map Explorer
feed.subtitle: SAP Road Map Explorer Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: SAP Road Map Explorer - session issue
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

does anyone else have the problem that the SAP Road Map Explorer session expires continuously?

https://roadmaps.sap.com/board

When I log in the pop up appears and as soon as I click "Refresh" the page is reloaded and the pop up appears again.

BR Tobias

entry.title: Cloud for Customer Core Application Roadmap
entry.content:
Hello,

How come SAP Cloud for Customer core application roadmap is so poor?

Please see the link below:

https://roadmaps.sap.com/board?range=CURRENT-LAST&PRODUCT=67837800100800004276#Q4%202021

in 2022 Q1 there is almost no new features in the roadmap, in Q2 and in Q3 the roadmap is empty and in Q4 there is only one feature.

Kind Regards,

Daniel Fogel

entry.title: Extract/Download Test Scripts from Manage Your Test Processes App
entry.content:
We are looking for a way to easily build an offline UAT test plan, based on a subset of SIT scenarios. This is to save having to write out test scripts manually when they are in front of me in the system. For SIT we are using the automated testing functionality within S/4HC. I can download the test cases from the "Test Your Processes" App however this is only the high level scenarios, not the process steps.

The "Manage Your Test Processes" App does allow a download of the process steps but only in .XML format and not in any useable format for an Excel plan. We do not want to use the automated test tool

entry.title: MAP=$ 0.01
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We have created a placeholder for MAP=$0.01 for Materials which were not in use for a combination of Valuation Class and Valuation Area (Plant)

However that is coming to bite us as when the user picks a incorrect valuation class during goods movement; the documents are posted with very low amounts

Is there any way we can put a error or warning message when MAP =0,01 and recieving and issing stock =0?

Please let me know if you need more info


Thanks much Alec

entry.title: BI 2024 - Business View Manager Support
entry.content:
Hello,

Just want to ask whether Business View Manager (Business Views) will be continue to be supported and included in BI 2024.

Thank you.

entry.title: SAP Process Automation - Support for Google Workspace
entry.content:
Hello,

I see from the Road Map Explorer (link below) that Google Workspace integration is planned for Q4. It is built on Business Technology Platform (also confirmed by this press release) but does anyone know:

  • Do you need to purchase/subscribe to BTP to use it?
  • Which versions of S/4HANA does it support? On Premise, Cloud (Public or Private) or both?

Q4 FY22: Support for Google Workspace (formerly G Suite): productivity suite

Regards,

Eric

entry.title: Color code of SAP road map
entry.content: I am new to the roadmap and was wondering the meaning behind th edifferent color tabs.

entry.title: how to mapping bp master virtual account to incoming payment
entry.content: hye sap team we need help can you please guide me how to map bp master payment term to incoming payment. we need to add bank account in incoming payment . account details is in bp master please help me.

entry.title: Is Navigation map activated yet?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Signavio team

Would like to understand if the Navigation Map feature is enabled as communicated previously to be early Jan 2023? Thanks.

entry.title: RoadMaps SAP Activate
entry.content:
Bom dia, tenho algumas duvidas em relação aos RoadMaps após estudar o SAP RoadMap Viewer:

1. o arquivo “Transition_to_SAP_S4HANA - 23Q1_Final_External” baixado do roadmap viewer verifiquei que nos cenários “selective data transition” e “system convertion” não cita a opção cloud. Não se aplicam à opção cloud? Se não, qual seria o arquivo que se aplica à opção cloud?

2.Qual a aplicação do radmap "successFactor"?

Obrigado,

João Pimentel

entry.title: Daueraufträge in Ariba Buying
entry.content:
Hallo zusammen,

kann man Daueraufträge in Ariba Buying anlegen oder gibt es dazu ein neues Feature?

Danke vorab und viele Grüße

Christian Frank

entry.title: Project Plan Template in XML for Focused Build
entry.content:
Hi, I was not able to find the project plan template in XML (or excell or mpp) for the RoadMap SAP Activate Methodology for Business Suite and On-Premise- Agile and Waterfall..it says that it doesn´t exist. Does anybody know why? I´m trying to create a template in Focused Build based on this templates and it would be a must needed help.

Thanks.

entry.title: Best Practice Explorer
entry.content:
Hello,

Previous version of the best practice explorer allowed to translate the page into certain languages.

Regarding my actual customer a German version of the test scripts would be very useful. But I either have not found the way to change the language for the downloads or they are now only in English available.

Can anyone help me with that issue?

Kind Regards, Wolf

entry.title: Guided sourcing
entry.content:
It has been recommended to go for Guided Sourcing instead of Standard Sourcing as all the innovations are being done in Guided Sourcing and Standard Sourcing will be obsolete in near future, therefore, our organization has opted for Guided Sourcing based on the recommendation. But, based on our previous experience, some issues were found in guided sourcing when it is integrated with external system (SAP S/4 HANA) and the patches were being built as per the SAP technical team.

Can you please confirm if the Guided Sourcing is now good to go for integrated processes implementation and all integration related components are built, up and running.

entry.title: SAP Activate Methodology Accelerators - Error
entry.content:
Good morning everyone,

We are accessing the public documentation on the SAP Activate Methodology within the Roadmap and reviewing the Excel document titled "Project-Plan_EN_24Q1-Activity and Task-Level.xlsx" where we are having issues with 2 documents in particular.

1) ID S4H.0376 – Data Migration Issues and Risks Template: The source URL has an associated document other than the one in the "S4H_127" title that is not a data migration document is OCM.

2) ID S4H.0378 – Data Migration Quality Tracking: Same error as case 1, associated source is not correct.

Does anyone know the correct source for these two documents?.

Is there another public SAP Activate database that we can consult?.

Thank you all and best regards.

entry.title: Inbound delivery
entry.content:
Hi Experts

While doing post goods receipt I am facing error that is import clearance message is not received from customs Authority

Can anyone help me to resolve this issue

entry.title: Standard test script for SAP PS module
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I'm new to SAP S/HANA system. Can anyone please help to download customer and internal project standards procedure from SAP PS module.

entry.title: AP invoices repository
entry.content:
Hi all,

 

My client is using the attachments in the manage supplier invoices app in 2 SL and would like to know how to access that repository. 

I believe documents are stored in SAP DMS or via ArchiveLink but i do not have much information on these. I have been told to use SAP_COM_0109 communication arrangements or connect via BTP-based content services for integration or backend access, unfortunately again i do not have much knowledge on that as well.

Any guidance on how to access that repository and a step by step guide will be greatly appreciated. 

thanks!
